San Francisco, Downtown - JavaScript Software Engineer

http://logg.ly/jobs

Do you love logs? Loggly has over 1,000 deployed users and a ton of cool partners including Heroku, EY, and Amazon.

If you are looking for a challenge and are sick and tired of working on the same old web technologies, look no further. We're building a massively scalable time series search and processing engine which we'll use to heat up servers in the kitchen so we can cook bacon on them.
